comments: He\'s such a troll in class. He takes advantage of the subjective nature of philosophy by preaching his own philosophical ideas. He\'s pretty slow on grading.

Good: Attendance NOT mandatory, easy+blended class, approachable. Bad: SLOW GRADER, limited and unclear feedback, does not check email, inflexible with argument topics, teaches nothing in class, completely useless! My grade would be better if he provided timely feedback. We were on our 7th assignment when he graded the 3rd! Grade Approx: B-
